document_data.name: Pratcus
document_data.mainbody: '''Pratcus''' was a [[dwarf]] priest of [[Damara]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Pratcus had the typical sturdy build of a dwarf with muscular arms. He wore a sleeveless studded leather vest.
document_data.Abilities: Pratcus could enact all kinds of priestly magic, such as casting the ''[[bull's strength]]'' spell.
document_data.History: He died during the fight at the replica [[Castle Perilous]], impaled on an iron spike trap, in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}.
